title: In Death's Keep: Book One: The Dominion Wars
description: Upon hearing rumors of war, the citizens of Arxsolum, protected by natural boundaries, do not hesitate to send their Army north to bolster the defenses of the Eastern Dominion. Too late do they discover that the enemy is already at their doorstep and their city is just the first step of the invader's intended path of destruction. The faithful of Arxsolum understand that freedom comes at a price, but when they put their fate in the hands of a stranger they find that price may be more than just their lives.
author: J.A. Beix
